name: Tanigawa K?ji no Sh?gi Shinan II: Meijin e no Michi
description:
Tanigawa K?ji no Sh?gi Shinan II: Meijin e no Michi is a Sh?gi simulation game featuring the titular Sh?gi player K?ji Tanigawa, and is the second game in the series. The game has three modes of play:

Game (??) is the main feature of this game. You must compete against the Four Heavenly Kings: Oshou Doronuma (????), Shizen Daiou (????), Jizai Shougun (????) before finally taking on Koji Tanigawa.

In Tsume Sh?gi (???), you must figure out the correct move to put the opponent in Checkmate.

In the Next Move (????) mode, the player must decide one of four moves that will be the most advantageous to them.

releases.comments: The back box says 88.5 on it. Most Pony Canyon games had the release date on the back.
